DOC.brief_summary: Investigation relative bioavailability single dose BI 691751 give alone together itraconazole ; safety tolerability
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy male subject 2. body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 3 . Subjects must able understand comply study requirement Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any finding medical examination ( include blood pressure ( BP ) , pulse rate ( PR ) , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) ) deviate normal judge clinically relevant investigator . 2 . Pulse rate outside 45 100 bpm repeat measurement systolic BP outside 90 140 mmHg diastolic BP outside 50 90 mmHg . 3 . Any laboratory value outside reference range investigator considers clinical relevance 4 . Any alanine transaminase ( ALT/GPT ) , aspartate transaminase ( AST/GOT ) , gammaglutamyltransferase ( GGT ) value outside reference range screen examination 5 . Any evidence concomitant disease judge clinically relevant investigator 6 . Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological , hormonal disorder 7 . Any history relevant liver disease disturbance liver function , jaundice , drug induce liver injury , DubinJohnson syndrome , Rotor syndrome , liver tumor
